description.zh-cn: 基督教信徒人数最多的宗派及教会，与东正教、新教并列为基督教三大分支。
description.en: The largest Christian church, with over 1.3 billion baptised Catholics worldwide as of 2021. It is one of the three major branches of Christianity, alongside Eastern Orthodoxy and Protestantism.

description.zh-cn: 基督教的核心人物，被天主教会认为是其创始者和天主之子。
description.en: The central figure of Christianity, considered by the Catholic Church to be its founder and the Son of God.

description.zh-cn: 耶稣基督的十二宗徒之一，被天主教会认为是罗马教会的第一位主教。
description.en: One of the Twelve Apostles of Jesus Christ, considered by the Catholic Church to be the first bishop of Rome.

description.zh-cn: 在维基百科页面信息框中被列为时任教宗。
description.en: Listed as the reigning Pope in the Wikipedia page's infobox.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的中央政府和最高领导机构。
description.en: The central government and supreme governing body of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 圣座的行政机构，协助教宗处理普世教会的事务。
description.en: The administrative apparatus of the Holy See, which assists the Pope in governing the universal Church.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会中最大的个别教会，唯一的西方传统教会。
description.en: The largest particular church within the Catholic Church and the only Western traditional church.

description.zh-cn: 与教宗完全共融的23个自治的东方基督教会。
description.en: The 23 autonomous Eastern Christian particular churches in full communion with the Pope.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的发源地。
description.en: The founding place of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 导致天主教会（西方）与东正教会（东方）分离的历史事件。
description.en: The historical event that led to the separation of the Catholic Church (West) and the Eastern Orthodox Church (East).

description.zh-cn: 基督教三大分支之一，在东西教会大分裂后从天主教会分离。
description.en: One of the three major branches of Christianity, which separated from the Catholic Church after the East-West Schism.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪欧洲的宗教改革运动，导致新教的产生并与天主教会分离。
description.en: A 16th-century religious movement in Europe that led to the creation of Protestantism and its separation from the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 基督教三大分支之一，起源于16世纪的宗教改革运动。
description.en: One of the three major branches of Christianity, originating from the 16th-century Reformation.

description.zh-cn: 意大利耶稣会传教士，明朝末年将天主教传入中国。
description.en: An Italian Jesuit priest who introduced Catholicism to China in the late Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会的主要男修会之一，注重教育和传教工作。
description.en: One of the major male religious orders of the Catholic Church, focusing on education and missionary work.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员、学者，与利玛窦合作，协助天主教在中国的传播。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty official and scholar who collaborated with Matteo Ricci and assisted in the spread of Catholicism in China.

description.zh-cn: 天主教枢机主教，首任宗座驻华代表，创立了主徒会。
description.en: A Catholic Cardinal, the first Apostolic Delegate to China, and the founder of the Congregation of the Disciples of the Lord.

en: Congregation of the Disciples of the Lord

description.zh-cn: 由刚恒毅枢机主教在中国创立的天主教修会。
description.en: A Catholic religious congregation founded in China by Cardinal Celso Costantini.

description.zh-cn: 比利时籍天主教神父，后加入中国籍，在中国创立了耀汉小兄弟会和德来小姊妹会。
description.en: A Belgian Catholic priest who later became a Chinese citizen and founded the Congregation of the Little Brothers of St. John the Baptist and the Congregation of the Little Sisters of Saint Thérèse of the Child Jesus in China.

en: Congregation of the Little Brothers of St. John the Baptist

description.zh-cn: 由雷鸣远神父在中国创立的天主教男修会。
description.en: A Catholic male religious congregation founded in China by Father Vincent Lebbe.

en: Congregation of the Little Sisters of Saint Thérèse of the Child Jesus

description.zh-cn: 由雷鸣远神父在中国创立的天主教女修会。
description.en: A Catholic female religious congregation founded in China by Father Vincent Lebbe.

description.zh-cn: 天主教大公会议，在此会议上宣布了圣母为“天主之母”的信理。
description.en: An ecumenical council of the Catholic Church at which the doctrine of Mary as the 'Mother of God' (Theotokos) was proclaimed.

description.zh-cn: 天主教关于圣母玛利亚的信理之一，承认她是天主耶稣基督的母亲。
description.en: One of the Catholic dogmas concerning the Virgin Mary, acknowledging her as the mother of Jesus Christ, who is God.

description.zh-cn: 自1949年起统治中国大陆的政权，其与圣座的关系复杂，并在其境内成立了官方的中国天主教爱国会。
description.en: The regime governing mainland China since 1949. Its relationship with the Holy See is complex, and it established the official Chinese Patriotic Catholic Association within its borders.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国政府建立和控制的官方天主教管理机构，不被圣座承认。
description.en: The official Catholic governing body established and controlled by the government of the People's Republic of China, not recognized by the Holy See.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝加入中国天主教爱国会、继续忠于罗马教宗的中国天主教会团体。
description.en: The community of the Catholic Church in China that refuses to join the Chinese Patriotic Catholic Association and remains loyal to the Pope of Rome.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会第265任教宗，曾于2007年向中国天主教徒发出牧函，寻求与中国政府对话。
description.en: The 265th Pope of the Catholic Church, who issued a pastoral letter to Chinese Catholics in 2007, seeking dialogue with the Chinese government.

nodes.id: 《致中华人民共和国内天主教徒信》

zh-cn: 《致中华人民共和国内天主教徒信》
en: Letter to the Catholics in the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 教宗本笃十六世向中国天主教徒发布的牧函，阐述了圣座对中国教会问题的立场并寻求对话。
description.en: A pastoral letter issued by Pope Benedict XVI to Catholics in China, explaining the Holy See's position on issues of the Church in China and seeking dialogue.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国最高领导人。曾与教宗方济各互通信件。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He has exchanged correspondence with Pope Francis.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会现任教宗。曾与中国国家主席习近平互通信件，并在其任内达成了中梵关于主教任命的临时性协议。
description.en: The current Pope of the Catholic Church. He has exchanged correspondence with Chinese President Xi Jinping, and during his pontificate, a provisional agreement between China and the Vatican on the appointment of bishops was reached.

description.zh-cn: 天主教会第264任教宗，于2000年册封了120位中华殉道圣人。
description.en: The 264th Pope of the Catholic Church, who canonized 120 Chinese Martyr Saints in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 在1648年至1930年间在中国殉教并于2000年被教宗若望保禄二世封圣的120位天主教徒。
description.en: A group of 120 Catholics who were martyred in China between 1648 and 1930 and were canonized by Pope John Paul II in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 根据天主教会的信仰，教会由耶稣基督建立于公元33年的耶路撒冷。
description.en: According to Catholic belief, the Church was founded by Jesus Christ in Jerusalem in 33 AD.

description.zh-cn: 天主教相信耶稣基督将建立教会的使命托付给了宗徒伯多禄（彼得）。
description.en: Catholicism believes that Jesus Christ entrusted the mission of building the Church to the Apostle Peter.

position.zh-cn: 罗马教会的第一位主教
position.en: First Bishop of the Church of Rome

description.zh-cn: 天主教会认为宗徒伯多禄是罗马教会的第一位主教。
description.en: The Catholic Church considers the Apostle Peter to be the first Bishop of the Church of Rome.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面信息框，良十四世是天主教会的领袖教宗。
description.en: According to the page's infobox, Leo XIV is the Pope, the leader of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 罗马教廷是执行圣座行政职能的机构。
description.en: The Roman Curia is the apparatus that carries out the administrative functions of the Holy See.

description.zh-cn: 拉丁礼教会是天主教会中规模最大的个别教会。
description.en: The Latin Church is the largest particular church within the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 东仪天主教会是与教宗完全共融的23个自治教会。
description.en: The Eastern Catholic Churches are 23 autonomous churches in full communion with the Pope.

description.zh-cn: 11世纪的东西教会大分裂导致了西方教会（天主教会）与东方教会（东正教会）的决裂。
description.en: The East-West Schism in the 11th century caused a break between the Western Church (Catholic Church) and the Eastern Church (Eastern Orthodox Church).

description.zh-cn: 自1054年东西教会大分裂后，天主教会与东正教长期处于分离状态。
description.en: Since the East-West Schism of 1054, the Catholic Church and the Eastern Orthodox Church have been in a state of separation.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪的宗教改革运动挑战了天主教会的权威，并导致了新教教会的分离。
description.en: The 16th-century Protestant Reformation challenged the authority of the Catholic Church and led to the separation of Protestant churches.

description.zh-cn: 宗教改革运动催生了新教的蓬勃发展。
description.en: The Reformation gave rise to the flourishing development of Protestantism.

description.zh-cn: 利玛窦是耶稣会的会士。
description.en: Matteo Ricci was a member of the Society of Jesus (Jesuits).

description.zh-cn: 利玛窦在明朝中叶成功进入中国传教，使天主教再次在中国传播开来。
description.en: Matteo Ricci successfully entered China to conduct missionary work in the mid-Ming Dynasty, leading to the renewed spread of Catholicism in China.

description.zh-cn: 徐光启与利玛窦讨论并共同确立了将基督教的“God”翻译为中文“天主”。
description.en: Xu Guangqi discussed with and, alongside Matteo Ricci, established the Chinese translation of the Christian 'God' as '天主' (Tīanzhǔ).

description.zh-cn: 首任宗座驻华代表刚恒毅枢机主教创立了主徒会。
description.en: Cardinal Celso Costantini, the first Apostolic Delegate to China, founded the Congregation of the Disciples of the Lord.

description.zh-cn: 雷鸣远神父在安国教区创立了耀汉小兄弟会。
description.en: Father Vincent Lebbe founded the Congregation of the Little Brothers of St. John the Baptist in the Diocese of Anguo.

description.zh-cn: 雷鸣远神父在安国教区创立了德来小姊妹会。
description.en: Father Vincent Lebbe founded the Congregation of the Little Sisters of Saint Thérèse of the Child Jesus in the Diocese of Anguo.

description.zh-cn: 在431年的厄弗所大公会议中，教会宣布了圣母为“天主之母”的信理。
description.en: At the Council of Ephesus in 431, the Church proclaimed the dogma of Mary as the 'Mother of God' (Theotokos).

description.zh-cn: 中国天主教爱国会是在中国共产党的影响下，于1957年由部分神职人员和教友成立的官方组织。
description.en: The Chinese Patriotic Catholic Association is an official organization founded in 1957 by some clergy and laypeople under the influence of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国天主教爱国会强调教会自主，脱离教宗和罗马的直接领导，与圣座的权威相对立。
description.en: The Chinese Patriotic Catholic Association emphasizes church autonomy, breaking away from the direct leadership of the Pope and Rome, which puts it in opposition to the authority of the Holy See.

description.zh-cn: 中国天主教地下教会拒绝加入爱国会，保持对罗马教宗的忠诚。
description.en: The Chinese Catholic underground church refuses to join the Patriotic Association and maintains loyalty to the Pope of Rome.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝在政府登记的中国天主教会（忠贞教会）受到了来自中国官方的坚决打击。
description.en: The unregistered Catholic Church in China (Loyal Church) has been resolutely cracked down on by Chinese officials.

relationships.target: 《致中华人民共和国内天主教徒信》

description.zh-cn: 教宗本笃十六世于2007年6月30日向中华人民共和国的天主教徒发出了《致中华人民共和国内天主教徒信》牧函。
description.en: Pope Benedict XVI issued the pastoral letter 'Letter to the Catholics in the People's Republic of China' on June 30, 2007.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与圣座于2018年9月22日达成了关于主教任命的临时性协议。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and the Holy See reached a provisional agreement on the appointment of bishops on September 22, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 教宗方济各与中国共产党总书记习近平曾互通信件。
description.en: Pope Francis and the General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party Xi Jinping have exchanged correspondence.

description.zh-cn: 教宗若望保禄二世于2000年10月1日将120位在中国殉教的天主教徒宣布为圣人。
description.en: Pope John Paul II declared 120 Catholics who were martyred in China as saints on October 1, 2000.
